app_descript:
Healthians - Full Body Checkup

Healthians is your go-to solution for comprehensive at-home diagnostic tests, scan tests, and doctor consultations throughout India. Leveraging advanced technology, this app ensures that users receive quick and reliable reports at competitive prices. With operations spanning over 250 cities, Healthians stands out as one of the nation‚Äôs most rapidly evolving platforms focused on preventive health care.

Core Features

  • Comprehensive Health Services: Access a wide range of blood and scan tests including full body checkups, pregnancy checkups, and diabetes tests, all from the comfort of your home. ü©∏
  • Online Doctor Consultations: Benefit from consultations across 20+ specialties starting as low as Rs.129, with potential cashback offers. üíª
  • Free Home Sample Collection: Enjoy the convenience of free home sample collection for blood tests and additional health screenings. üè†
  • Smart Reporting: Receive your health reports within 24 hours, ensuring timely insights into your health status. ‚è∞
  • Surgery Solutions: Get end-to-end assistance for surgeries, covering everything from booking to insurance paperwork. üè•

Pros

  • Cost-effective Services: Offers value for money with competitively priced test and consultation packages. üí∞
  • Rapid Results: Promises results within a short timeframe from NABL accredited labs, ensuring accuracy and reliability. üèÜ
  • Convenient Booking: Easily book tests and consultations through the app, making healthcare accessible at your fingertips. üì±
  • Expert Guidance: Access expert advice, health tips, and nutritional guidance from qualified doctors and dietitians. ü©∫

Cons

Price

The app is free to download, and while many services are available at competitive rates starting from Rs.129, in-app purchases for premium services may be available.
